Description:
Hello,

"Greetings from NES Fircroft"

We are looking out for below role for one of the leading OFS (Oil Field services) company in Saudi Arabia.

Role – Field Specialist (Artificial Lift Systems)
Location – Saudi Arabia
Contract – Consultant to leading OFS Client through NESFircroft

Profile required:
05 Years of Experience in ALS field operations & Electrical Submersible Pump (ESP).

If interested, kindly share your updated cv on anita.yadav@nesfircroft.com

With over 90 years' combined experience, NES Fircroft (NES) is proud to be the world's leading engineering staffing provider spanning the Oil & Gas, Power & Renewables, Chemicals, Construction & Infrastructure, Life Sciences, Mining and Manufacturing sectors worldwide. With more than 80 offices in 45 countries, we are able to provide our clients with the engineering and technical expertise they need, wherever and whenever it is needed. We offer contractors far more than a traditional recruitment service, supporting with everything from securing visas and work permits, to providing market-leading benefits packages and accommodation, ensuring they are safely and compliantly able to support our clients.Job Details
